subtitles:
184178 186869 - Oh, God...
- Keep your shit together.
186919 190000 lf you wanna get 'em out of here.

190870 193520 - l can pop these, no problem.
- So get to it!
207744 210225 Security, we have a break-in. Get the...

218707 221528 l know who you are.
l know what you think...

221618 225449 lf you don't wanna get hurt,
keep your mouth shut and don't move.

225579 230790 The chimps are infected. They're highly
contagious. They've been given an inhibitor.

230880 234361 - lnfected with what?
- To cure, you must first understand.

242933 246104 - What is he talking about?
- Get the cages open.

248235 252536 Listen, you sick bastard,
we're taking your torture victims with us.
252626 254196 We'll get you out of here.

254276 258978 The animals are contagious. The infection
is in their blood and saliva. One bite...
276332 278463 Get it off! Get it off!

282074 285284 - What's the matter with her?
- You have to kill her!

293947 297158 - What's the matter with her?
- We have to kill her now!

1002822 1005692 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just shut up!

1013865 1016435 - Covered everything.
- Who are those people?

1045093 1047313 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just move!

1077321 1082062 Man walks into a bar with a giraffe.
They each get pissed.

1084233 1089454 The man goes to leave and the barman says
''Oi! You can't leave that lying there.''
1089544 1093585 He says ''No, it's not a lion. lt's a giraffe''.
1104198 1107109 You two should get on like a house on fire.

1113891 1117422 - Are you a doctor?
- He's not a doctor. He's a patient.

1121983 1128424 l was riding a package from Farringdon to
Shaftesbury Avenue and a car cut across me.

1128504 1132245 Then l wake up today in hospital.
l wake up and l'm...

1158422 1164684 lt started as rioting, and right from
the beginning you knew this was different.

1164774 1168945 Because it was happening
in small villages, market towns.
1169815 1172556 And then it wasn't on the TV any more.

1172636 1177377 lt was in the street outside.
lt was coming through your windows.
1181248 1184079 You didn't need a doctor to tell you that.
1186690 1189210 There was something in the blood.

1190691 1195642 By the time they tried to evacuate
the cities, it was already too late.
1202784 1205474 And that's when the exodus started.

1209696 1213347 there were reports of lnfection
in Paris and New York.
1215737 1218648 We didn't hear anything more after that.

1221609 1224569 - What's the government doing?
- There's no government.

1227220 1231261 There's always a government.
They're in a bunker or a plane...

1231391 1235652 No, there's no government,
no police, no army.
1237133 1240224 No TV, no radio, no electricity.

1240834 1245005 You're the first uninfected person
we've seen in six days.

1263400 1267401 Look, l have to find them.
They live in Deptford. l can walk it. OK?
1267491 1270061 You'll go and come back, yeah?

1284845 1289276 You never go anywhere alone
unless you've got no choice.

1291757 1295848 Only travel during daylight.
Unless you've got no choice.

1300019 1303630 We'll all go and find
your dead parents together, OK?

1318284 1321465 lf you want her to slow down,
you'll have to say.

1485858 1489809 They died peacefully.
You should be grateful.

1496250 1500772 parents and my sister,
we went to Paddington Station,

1503382 1508724 hoping maybe we could get on a plane,
maybe we could buy our way onto a plane.
1509384 1511724 l remember my dad had all this cash,
1511814 1515165 even though cash was completely useless.
1516686 1519817 About 20,000 other people had the same idea.
1525388 1527689 l lost my grip on my sister's hand.
1529869 1532210 l remember the ground was soft.

1534170 1538561 l looked down
and l was standing on all these people.
1538651 1542602 Like a carpet. People who had fallen and...

1542692 1546654 Somewhere in the crowd
there were lnfected. lt spread fast.

1546734 1550084 No one could run.
All you could do was climb.

1551695 1554786 Climb over more people.
So l did that. l climbed.
1554876 1557216 And l got up on top of this kiosk.

1559527 1564478 Looking down, you couldn't tell
which faces were infected and which weren't.

1564568 1568439 Then l saw my dad.
Not my mum or my sister.

1582573 1587704 We don't have time to get back to the shop
before dark. We should stay here tonight.

1590405 1593226 My room's up at the top.
You two can have that.
1593316 1596667 No, we'll all sleep in the same room. lt's safer.
1699343 1701644 Give me a drink of that, will ya?
1710516 1712607 l'll start working on them, then.

1746056 1749006 - That's Mr Bridges.
- Were you bitten?
1749096 1751317 And his daughter. From four doors down.
1754578 1757489 Did any of the blood get in your mouth?
1795368 1797459 Do you have any clothes here?

1800540 1804201 Then get them and get dressed.
We have to leave now.

1804281 1807942 More lnfected will be coming.
They always do.

1836729 1839730 (Jim) How did you know?
How did you know he was infected?

1839810 1843731 - The blood.
- There was blood on me. lt was on you.

1843811 1849212 l didn't know he was infected.
He knew. l could see it in his face.

1849292 1853684 lf someone gets infected,
you've about 20 seconds to kill them.

1853774 1858905 lt might be your brother, your sister
or your oldest friend. lt makes no difference.

1858995 1864426 Just so you know where you stand,
if it happens to you, l'll do it in a heartbeat.

1864516 1868738 He was full of plans.
Have you got any plans, Jim?

1868818 1873259 Do you want us to find a cure and
save the world orjust fall in love and fuck?
1875959 1878520 Staying alive's as good as it gets.

1937275 1940366 What is it about tower blocks
and shopping trolleys?
1940446 1943537 Stop talking. lt's a long way up.
1961502 1963542 Now l do need a break.

1983327 1988639 - Why didn't you say something before?
- l didn't think you'd give a shit.

1989849 1994120 You've got no fat on you
and all you've had to eat is sugar.
1996381 1998641 There isn't a lot we can do about that

1998721 2003813 except pump you full of painkillers
and give you more sugar. As for sugar,

2009554 2012555 Actually,
l did have a can of Tango somewhere.

2089965 2092966 - Open the fucking door!
- Where's Dad?
2093056 2095317 Let them in, Hannah. Let them inside.

2128715 2131806 - Selena.
- Selena. Good to meet you.
2147070 2149371 Calls for a celebration, l'd say.
2149461 2152502 Why don't you all sit down and...
2152592 2155552 Hannah, what have we got to offer?
2155632 2158113 We've got Mum's creme de menthe.

2169116 2172117 - (Frank) Where are the bloody glasses?
- Middle cupboard.
2172207 2175077 Nah, the good ones. lt's a celebration.
2197863 2200954 l know it isn't much but, well, cheers.

2229742 2235353 Sorry we couldn't spare the water.
Same with the toilet. The flush doesn't work.
2237004 2239264 You'll have to use the bucket.
2245836 2248447 Have to empty it each morning.

2248527 2252188 Just chuck it over the balcony.
No mod cons here.
2254058 2257189 Listen, it's late. We're gonna turn in.
2270532 2272923 l'll take the living room. lt's fine.

2309633 2313334 - So what do you make of them?
- Well, they're desperate.
2314464 2317285 Probably need us more than we need them.

2328598 2333249 You should be more concerned about
whether they're gonna slow you down.

2333379 2337120 - Because if they slowed you down...
- l'd leave them behind.

2341601 2345122 Then you're gonna wind up
getting yourself killed.
2361166 2364427 You think l don't get it, but l do get it.

2366297 2370298 And l know l'd be dead already
if l hadn't met you.
2402527 2404567 We lost water pressure three weeks ago.

2404697 2408788 l thought we'd be OK with the water
from the other flats. Cisterns and tanks.

2408878 2412099 But it vanishes so quick
you wouldn't believe.

2428574 2432835 You can set up a plastic sheet
to catch dew and condensation.
2432925 2436666 Saw it on TV once, but l can't make it work.
2452710 2455841 Jim, we're not going to be able to stay here.

2464803 2468544 - There's been no broadcasts for weeks.
- Just listen.

2468634 2473195 (man on radio) Salvation is here.
The answer to lnfection is here.
2473285 2476286 if you can hear this, you're not alone.

2476376 2480897 There are others like you.
There are other survivors.
2480977 2483158 We are soldiers and we are armed.

2486639 2491200 - Quiet. There's more.
- Our location is the 42nd blockade, M602,

2494811 2498722 - You must find us. Salvation is...
- Now itjust repeats.

2498812 2501203 - lt's a recording?
- Yeah, it's a recording.
2501293 2504203 But this is where it's telling us to go.

2507944 2512726 The way things are, we might need
two or three days to get up there.

2518647 2524729 Sound carries in this flat. Me and Hannah
do need you more than you need us.

2524819 2527950 - Look, l didn't...
- No, it's OK. lt's the truth.
2528040 2530560 l can't leave the block if it's the two of us.

2530650 2534601 Something might happen to me.
Hannah'd be alone. l couldn't risk it.

2536472 2540783 lf it's a recording,
the soldiers who made it could be dead.

2540863 2544344 - lt's possible.
- That stuff about the answer to lnfection...

2544434 2548735 There is no answer!
lt's already done all the damage it can!

2548825 2551656 - Maybe they have a cure.
- Maybe they've got nothing.

2551736 2555827 - The only way to find out is to reach them.
- We could die trying, Frank!

2560308 2565999 And anyway, it isn't true what Dad said.
You need us just the same as we need you.

2569480 2574742 And we'll never be safe in the cities.
The soldiers could keep us safe.
2575482 2577572 So we have to try and get there.

2591706 2595447 Just so you know,
l don't take cheques or credit cards.

2624015 2627015 - (Frank) What do you think?
- lt's the most direct route.

2627105 2632367 Then we should take the indirect route.
The one in daylight and not underground.
2649981 2652462 No. See, this is a really shit idea.

2653332 2656723 You know why?
Because it's obviously a shit idea.

2656813 2661204 So we're gonna drive into the tunnel
full of fucking smashed cars...
2661294 2664205 lt's really fucking obviously a shit idea!
2699864 2702255 The world's worst place to get a flat.
2702345 2705696 Agreed. l think we'd better do this quick.
2708217 2710347 l've got the wheel. You're on the jack.

2724961 2728482 Do you hear that?
Hey, hey, do you hear that?

2760490 2764791 Forget the jack, Hannah.
There's no time. Just lift, everyone.
2764881 2768142 Grab hold! One, two, three, lift!

2774584 2779715 - (Selena) Don't look at them! Don't look!
- (Jim) l can see them! They're coming!

2790628 2793539 - Get the tyre on, Hannah!
- l'm trying.

2806932 2809373 - Get in the car!
- Come on!

2885873 2889434 Don't take anything
that needs to be cooked, OK?
2889564 2891394 l think you can eat that raw.

2899046 2903568 lf l never see another chocolate bar again,
it'll be too soon.

2908269 2911880 Now, single malt,
16-year-old, dark, full flavour.
2920012 2923233 Takes out the fire but leaves in the warmth.
2978157 2981198 Either we do this now or we're walking.

3033431 3036122 (quietly) Like going on holidays
with your aunt!

3134238 3137018 - Find anything, Jim?
- No! Let's get outta here.
3212998 3215999 l can, like, taste the vitamin C.
3216829 3219610 Mmmm, the raisins are so moist.

3280926 3284627 That you'll never hear
another piece of original music again.

3284717 3288888 You'll never read a book
that hasn't already been written,
3289928 3293759 or see a film that hasn't already been shot.
3298280 3301541 Um.... that's what you were thinking.
3304762 3307023 l was thinking l was wrong.

3318466 3322987 lt doesn't really mean anything
to Frank and Hannah because...

3324377 3327808 Well, she's got her dad
and he's got his daughter. So...

3330509 3334120 l was wrong when l said
staying alive is as good as it gets.
3337731 3340251 See, that's what l was thinking.

3358036 3361997 lt's getting late.
We'd better stay here for the night.
3390355 3393005 Selena didn't seem to have any trouble.

3409830 3413701 Bloody hell. Must've needed
a hell of a prescription for that lot.

3413791 3418092 l didn't need a prescription.
l qualified as a chemist.
3420792 3423363 Not only will we be able to get to sleep

3423443 3427144 but if we're attacked in the middle
of the night, we won't even care.

3427274 3429495 - Two each.
- Not for me, thanks.
3441968 3444669 Come on, Frank. Let her live a little.

3445759 3449760 - Give her half of one.
- All right. We're on.
3526690 3529471 You're having a bad dream, that's all.

3584795 3588266 - Did l miss breakfast?
- (Selena) You'll sleep through anything.

3588356 3593357 - (Jim) Did you have a fry-up?
- (Frank) We'll stop at a pub on the way. Door!

3617934 3622455 (radio) Our location
is the 42nd blockade, the M602,
3629937 3632938 The answer to lnfection is here.
3669287 3672638 The whole of Manchester, the whole city.
3674509 3676819 No fire crews to put it out.

3807803 3811804 l don't understand, Dad.
Did they leave?

3811894 3815025 - l don't like this. l think we should go.
- No!

3821857 3826678 Vehicles. We should check the vehicles.
There has to be something.

3943099 3946019 - Dad?
- Keep away from me! Keep away from me!
3946099 3948580 Keep away! Keep away! Keep away!
4011857 4014517 (man) Three survivors. One male, two female.
4014597 4017948 l repeat, one male, two female.

4082745 4087616 Well, we've got beds with clean sheets
and a boiler that produces hot water.
4087706 4090097 So you can all have a shower.
4090227 4093538 You look like you need one. Please.

4113493 4118715 lt ain't funny. l got loads of cooking to do,
you fucking Doris!
4127497 4130678 She's lost her dad, Jim. That's how she is.

4142981 4146552 Oh, don't do that.
Come on, come on, come on.

4150413 4155374 Hannah is what Frank says she is. Tough,
strong, and she'll cope just like l'll cope.

4155504 4159415 - Just like you'll cope.
- l don't want her to have to fucking cope.
4160685 4163116 l want her to be OK.
4164687 4166857 When Hannah had her dad it was OK.
4166947 4169728 lt was OK for them and it was OK for us.

4209868 4213389 - Yeah, we did.
- We must be a disappointment.

4213479 4219571 You were hoping for a full brigade. An army
base with helicopters and a field hospital.

4222001 4226173 - We were just hoping for...
- The answer to lnfection.

4230704 4235175 As l said before, it's here. Though
it may not be quite what you imagined.

4235575 4238486 - Just feel lucky to have found you.
- You were lucky.

4238576 4241707 The fire drove hundreds of lnfected
out of Manchester.
4241787 4244877 The surrounding area's teeming with them.

4254920 4260792 Flat terrain all round the house. Floodlights
which we've rigged up to a generator.

4264793 4269054 And we've been lacing the ground
with tripwires and land mines.

4269144 4273795 You wouldn't want to mow the lawn,
but if they get in, we hear them.

4277056 4281967 Secondary to protection,
our real job is to rebuild. Start again.
4282097 4284488 The belly of the house. The heart.

4284578 4289839 A wood-fired boiler providing us with hot
water. The first step towards civilisation.
4292100 4294230 Here you are. l'll swap you.

4294320 4297491 - Now don't be throwing it.
- Here, give us some.

4297581 4301622 Don't be fighting.
Will you put that back? Put it back.

4304193 4307194 - What are you cooking, Jones?
- Surprise, sir.

4331590 4336681 Mitchell managed to knock him out cold
and we got a chain round his neck.

4344333 4348374 The idea was to learn something
about lnfection.
4371080 4374511 He's telling me he'll never bake bread.

4386124 4391516 And eventually he'll tell me how long
the lnfected take to starve to death.
4431266 4433747 You'll have to wait and see
4436137 4438708 We hope it's chips, it's chips
4455142 4458493 Tinned ham, tinned peas, tinned beans and...

4466105 4468536 - lt's a feast, Jones.
- Honour of our guests.
4468626 4471847 Absolutely. l was going to propose a toast
4471937 4475067 but this omelette will do just as well.

4490632 4494543 Jones, did you notice while cooking
that these eggs were off?
4494633 4498023 l thought the salt might cover the taste, sir.
4505025 4507806 l don't suppose you can cook, can you?

4508636 4514118 l can't tell you how badly we need
someone with a little flair in the kitchen.

4514208 4518729 What a fucking disappointment.
l saw those eggs, l thought it was Christmas.

4518809 4522080 We'll have eggs again.
Once everything's back to normal.
4522160 4524991 You muppet! Look at him, eh?

4525081 4529122 He's still waiting
for Marks and Spencer's to reopen.

4529212 4533513 - You don't know nothing.
- l think Bill's got a point.
4533643 4536734 lf you look at the whole life of the planet,

4538814 4542955 you know, Man has only been around
for a few blinks of an eye.
4543735 4546166 So if the infection wipes us all out,
4547166 4549477 that is a return to normality.

4553478 4556479 - That what you meant, Bill?
- Yeah, yeah.
4556559 4559820 Have you met our New Age sergeant?

4562690 4567912 Tell me, Farrell, exactly why
did you join the army in the first place?

4570692 4574824 This is what l've seen
in the four weeks since lnfection.

4577614 4582175 Which is what l saw in the four weeks before
lnfection, the four weeks before that...

4582265 4587697 As far back as l care to remember,
people killing people.

4587787 4591438 Which to my mind
puts us in a state of normality now.

4599750 4602701 - You're not eating?
- l don't want to eat.

4605662 4608922 l don't want to eat.
l want to bury my dad.
4609833 4612923 He's one of the people you're talking about.
4617055 4619105 Let's go, let's go, let's go!

4670899 4674510 What do you want, a fucking sweetie?
Keep shooting, you cunt!
4691204 4693464 l ain't never seen that in my life!

4716130 4721782 Listen, sweetheart, you ain't
gonna be needing this any more.
4721862 4724042 Cos you got me to protect you now.

4725863 4731134 You wanna get your hands on a really
big chopper, you just come and see me.

4732785 4734955 - That's an offer, Mitch.
- Give her some.

4741177 4745658 Easy, tiger. You don't wanna go
picking a fight with me, son.

4753400 4756441 - Mitchell, first action on.
- Resecure the perimeter.
4756531 4759962 Then get to it. Jones, Bedford, go with him.
4770445 4773145 Clear the bodies off the lawn.
4776056 4778617 The rest of you, go with him.

4801023 4805234 We're very grateful for your protection
but if we're gonna stay here...

4805324 4806844 - Who have you killed?
- No one.

4806934 4812105 Who have you killed? You wouldn't be alive
now if you hadn't killed somebody.
4819367 4822498 l killed... l killed a boy.

4834161 4838942 But you had to.
Otherwise he'd have killed you.

4859898 4863689 Eight days ago l found Jones
with his gun in his mouth.

4864859 4869600 He said he was going to kill himself
because there was no future.
4869690 4872561 What could l say to him?

4872641 4877823 We fight off the lnfected or we wait
until they starve to death and then what?

4878773 4882604 What do nine men do
except wait to die themselves?

4882694 4888825 l moved us from the blockade, l set the radio
broadcasting and l promised them women.

4906390 4908180 - What is it?
- We have to go.

4908261 4910311 - Jim, wait!
- No time! Come on!
4916483 4918443 We get in the car and we go!

4919784 4924355 No! You're not going to keep them here!
You've got to let them go!

4924445 4927706 You can't keep them here!
Stay where you are!
4927786 4930486 l'm not gonna let you keep them here!
4944400 4946751 l want to give you a chance.
4950582 4952882 But l can't let them go.

4980929 4983720 (Farrell) Smithers says
''Women and semen don't mix.''

4983800 4986721 And Mr Burns says
''We all know what you think, Smithers.''

4986801 4989722 And that was my favourite joke
in The Simpsons.

4989802 4993413 That's what they're doing a few
hundred miles away, across the Channel,

4993503 4997934 across the Atlantic. Eating dinner
and watching the fucking Simpsons!

4998024 5001285 They're sleeping in their beds
next to their wives.

5001375 5007076 But we're here chained to a fucking radiator
because the OC has gone insane!

5008157 5012208 Starting the world again when the rest
of the world hasn't even stopped.
5013548 5016679 Just imagine, just think about it.
5017729 5020030 How could lnfection cross the oceans?

5020120 5024421 How could it cross the mountains
and the rivers? lt can be stopped.

5024511 5027212 Right now TVs are playing
and planes are flying

5027292 5031293 and the rest of the world
is continuing as fucking normal.

5035604 5039165 What would you do
with a diseased little island?

5047947 5052298 ''There is no lnfection.
lt's just people killing people.'' He's insane!

5098880 5101961 - Please...
- Believe me, l'm not interested.

5103051 5108183 You see, l'm gonna have the black one.
And l'm gonna make her squirm.

5108273 5112184 Mitchell, l swear to God
it's gonna end badly for you.
5116055 5118105 Get up, you cunt! Fucking move!

5143112 5146543 (Farrell) Come on then,
you fucking pansies. Do me first.
5146633 5149113 (Jones) No, Mitch. Mitch, just use the gat.

5149193 5152244 - (Farrell) So you're gonna stick me?
- (Jones) Shoot 'em!

5155065 5158116 (Farrell) ls that how you'd let
your sergeant go out, Jones?

5158196 5160116 - l'll shoot them!
- No, you won't.

5160196 5163677 You'll let him stick me?
Like a fucking dog?

5172980 5176941 You stupid cunt! What are you doing?
You wanna shoot me?

5177031 5181202 - You wanna shoot me? l'll kill you!
- Where's he fucking gone?
5182462 5185293 Fuck it! Get up! Get after him!

5187773 5190984 - Jones, move it!
- l can see him! l can see him!

5200777 5202647 - Can you see him?
- Through there!
5218131 5221602 He's over the wall. He's got no vehicle.

5260662 5264613 (West) The first thing we're going to do
is make you look more presentable.

5264703 5268274 The lady of the house
has an extensive wardrobe
5268354 5270925 which she certainly has no use for.
5271925 5273746 You can't do it to Hannah.

5273836 5277537 Go to the master bedroom,
pick out a wide selection.

5291060 5293841 - lt's only dressing up!
- No! Selena!

5293931 5297282 - l thought girls liked dressing up.
- Expensive dresses.

5316017 5320158 You need to leave me alone
with Hannah. OK?

5322018 5325759 - Listen, right. The OC wants...
- He wants us to dress up nice.

5325849 5329981 lf you want us to get changed,
you have to leave the room. OK?
5353767 5356637 Come on, lads. Let's leave the room.

5379734 5383695 We're gonna eat these, Hannah, OK?
Come on. Eat these.
5383775 5385905 Are you trying to kill me?
5388346 5390906 l'm making you not care. OK?
5402870 5405520 Stay here and put the dresses on.

5411392 5413962 He went over the wall.
We thought he'd be dead.
5644022 5646503 lt sounded like a Claymore to me.

5647543 5651504 All right, l'll go and hit the floods,
take a butcher's.
5654245 5656896 keep an eye on him, will ya?
5670069 5672550 l think they're having an effect.

5688114 5690985 What are you gonna do
if they don't come back?
5691725 5694816 Would you be the officer if Henry was dead?
5694906 5696906 ls that the way it works?

5700467 5704558 l don't think they are coming back.
l think they've been killed.

5723473 5726604 We're gonna get out of here.
Stay with it, Hannah.
5726694 5729525 Don't worry. l feel fine. Really.

5751611 5757132 Oi! Where the fuck are you going?
What's all the fucking shouting about?

5765094 5768485 Don'tjust stand there,
you soppy cunt! Get after them!
5790931 5793882 What the fuck you gonna do now?

5820458 5824199 - Defend these stairs with your fucking life!
- Hannah!

6002936 6007337 l haven't got any bullets.
l haven't got any fucking bullets!

6070694 6075525 lt's just you and me now, darlin'.
But don't worry, l'll get you out of here.

6075615 6080046 Then we'll find a nice little fucking place
somewhere. Just you and me.
6080136 6082487 And we'll live happy ever after, eh?
6146844 6149324 That was longer than a heartbeat.
6163588 6167109 Listen. Listen. lt's not all fucked.
6172900 6175381 We're gonna be OK. lt's not all fucked.

6175511 6178812 - l've got to explain something.
- Shut up.
6187334 6190905 Hannah, it's OK! He's not infected.
6190985 6193076 But l thought he was biting you.
6193166 6195856 l was kissing her. Are you stoned?
6198167 6200298 We have to get out of here. Come on!
